column4: I have downloaded and installed wolfenstein enemy territory, after installing i have woflentein menu option saying start game? everything works fine..after exiting game and loading again by typing "et" in terminal screen or loading thru apps , other ,,the maps will no longer download data needed or enter map at all. Any ideas to get them loading again.

I have downloaded and installed wolfenstein enemy territory, after installing i have woflentein menu option saying start game? everything works fine..after exiting game and loading again by typing "et" in terminal screen or loading thru apps , other ,,the maps will no longer download data needed or enter map at all. Any ideas to get them loading again.
you ran as root the first time
the game doesn't have write permissions in ~/.etwolf
this command shtould fix it: sudo chown -R `whoami` .etwolf
the mod is in the .etwolf directory, remove the correct .pk3 file and restart et
